meanings.definition: An advance showing or performance of something, such as a movie or play, before it is released to the public.
meanings.sent1: The previews of the new movie were exciting for the audience.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy watching previews before the main movie starts.
meanings.sent3: The previews of the play made everyone eager to see the full performance.
meanings.sent4: The previews of the concert were like a sneak peek into the upcoming show.
meanings.sent5: Attending the previews of the exhibition gave me a taste of what's to come.

meanings.definition: A brief summary or overview of something that is to come.
meanings.sent1: She read the previews of the book to get an idea of the storyline.
meanings.sent2: The magazine always includes previews of the next issue's content.
meanings.sent3: The previews of the game hinted at exciting new features.
meanings.sent4: The previews of the event were like a teaser for the attendees.
meanings.sent5: Checking out the previews of the menu helped me decide what to order.
